actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution recognizing the State of Illinois and the city of Chicago as hosts in 1992 of the official quincentennial celebration of the discovery of America.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the State of Illinois and the city of Chicago should host the 1992 official celebration of the 500th anniversary of the discovery of America.

titles.title: A joint resolution recognizing the State of Illinois and the city of Chicago as hosts in 1992 of the official quincentennial celebration of the discovery of America.
